rules.active: Blind everyone within 3 metres with bean juice.

details.flavour: Industrial Grade

rules.active: Summon a cast-steel anvil into existence above target character's head.

details.flavour: Meep-Meep.

rules.active: Choose a visible article of clothing. A snake appears inside of it.

details.flavour: "Always drink upstream from the herd" - The Sheriff

rules.active: Throw a pair of bola around a visible target

details.flavour: Bolas are excellent for capturing large mammals, like my portly friend Steve

rules.active: Put a large object or willing NPC in your hand.

details.flavour: Brilliant for barging, barrowing, borrowing, bearing, busing, and bumming.

rules.active: Cast a handful of sand and pocket lint into the air before you.

details.flavour: In total war, all tactics are acceptable.

rules.active: Choose a Blue or green in your hand. All cards in your hand become copies of that card.

details.flavour: Fax is short for facsimile, meaning "make similar".

rules.active: Target visible character will take 25 damage the next time they rest.

details.flavour: Sweet dreams.

rules.active: Target willing character ceases to exist for up to 1 hour. They return to the last spot they existed in afterwards.

details.flavour: Existence is rather tiring, it's advisable to take a break every once in a while.

rules.active: Target NPC becomes tired.

details.flavour: Man is born tired, and he lives to rest.

rules.active: Choose X up to 5. A boundary, impenetrable from within, is placed X metres away from you in all directions as long as you'd like

details.flavour: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Gredge Putley, Future Pickaxe Owner

rules.active: Target a doorway. The next living creature to pass through the door remains stuck in the frame until they take damage.

details.flavour: "You make a better door than a window" - Jimmy Paxton, Obstructed Individual

rules.active: Stand atop an object. You and the object are flung in the direction of your choice until obstructed.

details.flavour: You'd have gotten off on the wrong foot with whoever set off on the journey of a thousand steps.

rules.active: Summon a rigged pair of dice.
rules.passive: Whenever you would roll a d20, flip a coin instead. Heads for a critical success, tails for a critical failure.

rules.active: Learn the current location of an item you've touched in the past.

details.flavour: At last, the location of the missing socks.

rules.active: The ground shakes beneath you. All characters within 4 metres are knocked airborne.

details.flavour: Not suitable for tectonic fault zones.

rules.active: Attacks deal double damage until you play your next card.

details.flavour: I'm not unarmed, I've got two of them.

rules.active: Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 15 damage to visible target. Tails: Gun backfires, take 5 damage.

details.flavour: To get you out of a tight spot, like a colonial insurrection or a duel.

rules.active: Choose a 4 square metre area to fill temporarily with an opaque smoke

details.flavour: Mildly anoxic.

rules.active: Pick a point on the floor up to 2 metres away. The next NPC to walk there will fall over.

details.flavour: Nothing like a little prop humour.

rules.active: Possess a non-magic object within 5 tiles of your body until you lose concentration.

details.flavour: "There's something rather... lively, about this chair" - General Kudzo

rules.active: Evoke a disembodied hand to perform a simple action within 4 metres of you.

details.flavour: Give me five!

rules.active: Choose two visible points. You will be alerted the next time an NPC walks between them.

details.flavour: Mob hideouts are often mysteriously empty when the Cops arrive to perform arrests

rules.active: Fire a cannonball at a target of your choice.
rules.passive: You're surrounded by a ghostly aura.

details.flavour: Cannonballs were designed to destroy ships and stone fortresses. The effect they have on the human body is unspeakable.

rules.active: Apply a sandwich to the face of a visible character.

details.flavour: Indignity defeats the spirit, and the body is soon to follow

rules.active: Choose an NPC. They are stuck in place for ten seconds.

details.flavour: Have my legs always been this heavy?

rules.active: Cover an object in a thin layer of ice.

details.flavour: Whoa, chill.

rules.active: Burst into flames along with anyone you're touching.

details.flavour: I'm taking you straight to hell.

rules.active: Touch an NPC to freeze both of you. Until your hand is removed, neither of you can attack or perform actions

details.flavour: Let's savour this moment forever.

rules.active: Summon a pigeon to perform a simple task

details.flavour: He will try his best not to be distracted by breadcrumbs.

rules.active: Deal d6 bonus melee damage, igniting the target.

details.flavour: "I'm about to turn your Kitchen Dream into a Kitchen Nightmare" - Diner Employee Sr.
